data.title: Burnet County, TX homes for sale & real estate
data.meta_description: Instantly search and view photos of all homes for sale in Burnet County, TX now. Burnet County, TX real estate listings updated every 15 to 30 minutes.
data.text:
ABOUT THIS HOME

Burnet County, TX home for sale

Welcome to your dream home! This new construction home built by Stick Horse Construction will be ready for you to move in by the end of 2024. With 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, this home is perfect for families or those who love to entertain. Construction will include high-end finishes such as luxury vinyl plank flooring and quartz countertops throughout. The spacious kitchen includes a large island with plenty of seating, walk-in pantry with a built in wine/coffee bar, and a pot filler for the culinary enthusiast! The main living spaces feature an open floor plan complete with a designated dining space, and a large living room with a vaulted ceiling and electric fireplace. The primary bedroo

ABOUT THIS HOME

Burnet County, TX home for sale

This charming 1940-built farmhouse-style home offers 1,452 square feet of vintage character with modern updates. With 4 bedrooms (one of which can be converted into a home office) and 2 bathrooms, this property is ideal for families, professionals, or those looking for extra space. The home sits on a large corner lot in Bertram, TX, featuring a nice-sized, fenced-in backyard with beautiful oak trees, perfect for outdoor living. The home features well-preserved original wood floors that add warmth and character. Classic shiplap on the walls enhances the rustic farmhouse charm. Thoughtfully designed built-ins provide ample storage throughout the home. Enjoy relaxing or entertaining on the co

Burnet County, TX home for sale

Embrace the tranquility of Lake LBJ with this charming 1,792 sq. ft. home, offering 90 feet of waterfront just seconds away from open water. This 3-bedroom, 2-bath residence is designed for casual living and easy entertaining. The bright, open floor plan features a welcoming family room with a large fireplace, perfect for gathering with loved ones. The spacious galley kitchen provides ample prep space, ideal for avid chefs and hosts alike. The split bedroom layout offers privacy, with the primary suite boasting a sizable bathroom, complete with a soaking tub to melt away the day’s stresses and a walk-in shower. Two additional bedrooms and a hall bath are situated on the opposite side

Welcome to your dream home in the heart of Burnet, Texas! This charming 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom residence offers a perfect blend of comfort and convenience, just minutes away from all local amenities. With a thoughtfully designed split floor plan, this home ensures privacy and space for everyone. The expansive living areas flow seamlessly into a well-appointed kitchen, making it ideal for both everyday living and entertaining. Step outside to discover a generous backyard that's perfect for gatherings, gardening, or simply relaxing. A lovely patio provides a wonderful spot for outdoor meals or unwinding after a long day. Burnet County, TX home for sale

Welcome to your dream home in one of Burnet's most charming and established neighborhoods! This stunning single-level brick exterior home features 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 beautifully updated bathrooms, including a newly renovated primary bath suite with a modern closet. The large open living room boasts a new electric fireplace with built-in shelves, perfect for cozy gatherings. Enjoy the convenience of a 2-car garage with a long driveway, and a newly installed iron rod and privacy-fenced backyard that offers ample space, including a new 12x20 shed with lofts and electricity—ideal for extra storage or a workshop. The home’s curb appeal is enhanced by fresh landscaping and a we

Discover your dream home in this stunning new construction ranch-style residence, perfectly blending modern elegance with timeless charm. This beautifully crafted 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 1708 square foot home offers an inviting open floor plan that seamlessly connects living spaces, making it ideal for both everyday living and entertaining. Step into the heart of the home, where you'll find granite counters, upscale appliances, and custom cabinets, paired with the warmth of real wood doors and shelves that add a touch of natural beauty to every room. Every detail has been thoughtfully designed to create a space that is both functional and aesthetically pleasing. Situated on a third of an acr

ABOUT THIS HOME

Burnet County, TX home for sale

Gorgeous 120+/- acres, between Lampasas and Burnet. The property is one hour to Austin, 45 minutes to Cedar Park and Georgetown, and 35 minutes to Liberty Hill. It is just a few minutes off Hwy 281 on paved CR 103. Great opportunity to build your dream home or have a Hill Country get-a-way. The topography on the ranch has a gently sloping topography, good soil, and thick oak cover. The property is ag exempt and electricity is on the county road. Well and septic required. This ranch is well suited for use as a homestead, family retreat, hunting and all types of recreation. Sensible restrictions. More land available. Call for you’re showing today.

Experience lakeside luxury in this stunning 2,735 sq. ft. custom home, perfectly situated along 175 ft of Lake LBJ waterfront, boasting 5 boat slips, with three covered & 2 lifts located in the Texas Hill Country. This 3-bedroom, 3-bath retreat features a split bedroom plan with open living spaces, high ceilings, and tile floors throughout. The heart of the home is the spacious kitchen, boasting beautiful Alderwood cabinets, granite countertops, an island with breakfast bar, and an inviting family room with a rock wood-burning fireplace. Large windows offer breathtaking views of the water and the multi-level patios and decks, ideal for entertaining. The primary suite is a true sanctua

This 3 bedrooms and 2 bath home offers 1,608 sq ft of living space and sits on a spacious 0.570-acre lot. The covered front porch adds to the charm of this home, offering a perfect spot to enjoy your morning coffee. The sunroom, which can be converted into a third bedroom or used as a versatile space to suit your needs. The kitchen includes a laminate countertop island, ideal for meal preparation and casual dining. The property includes a 2-car attached garage located downstairs. An outbuilding shop provides extra space for storage, or a workshop. If you enjoy outdoor activities, you'll love the nearby boat launch, making it convenient for water adventures. Burnet County, TX home for sale

This 3 bed, 2 bath manufactured home with 1344 SF of living space is sitting on 3 spacious lots. A ramp leads to the entrance allowing for wheelchair access. The living space is complemented by a convenient wet bar and built-in shelving and storage. The galley style kitchen opens to the dining area and offers a breakfast bar for quick meals. The primary bedroom is large and features an ensuite bath with walk-in shower and grip accessible grab bars. Outside, you'll find a covered carport, providing ample parking and protection for your vehicles. The property also includes an storage shed for your tools and hobbies. For outdoor enthusiasts, a nearby boat launch makes it easy to enjoy water ad

Burnet County, TX home for sale

The Stillwater Ranch is +/- 52 acres located in Burnet County within 15 minutes (8.5 mi. ) to the SE of the growing town of Marble Falls, TX. The ranch is accessed and has direct road frontage off of paved CR 402, which dead ends shortly after the ranch offering low traffic and seclusion. There are +/- 100 feet of elevation changes offering breath taking views of the Colorado River Basin. The property is wildlife exempt offering low property taxes, and the ranch has native whitetail deer, turkey, dove, and a handful of quail that frequent the property. There is a capped water well drilled less than two years ago, overhead electric on site and available, road systems in place, one stock tank

This new home features 5 bedrooms (or 4 beds with a study with closet), a large driveway for boat and RV parking, open floorplan, fireplace, 10 ft ceilings, no carpet, plumbed for water softener, garage door openers, painted finished garage, back patio and front porch to enjoy sunsets, stainless steel appliances, quartz in kitchen and bathrooms, wal

Just one block from the picturesque Lake LBJ, this charming 1,282 sq ft home is the perfect blend of comfort and convenience, offering 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 full baths. Built to last, this home features a durable metal roof installed in 2014, ensuring longevity and peace of mind. Recent updates include a brand new 50-gallon water heater installed in May 2024 and a septic system that was pumped in 2018 and the kitchen was remodeled in 2018. One bathroom was updated a couple of years ago while the other was updated in 2009. The living room boasts a charming wood-burning fireplace, perfect for creating a warm and inviting atmosphere during those cool evenings. The property is fenced in bot

Burnet County, TX home for sale

Live the lake life in this charming 3 bedroom home on Lake LBJ. Fully remodeled in 2019 (inside and out). The updates include installed engineered wood flooring, neutral paint, replaced all windows and doors, the living room was opened to the kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, center island and custom cabinets. Enjoy the view of the lake through the wall of windows in the dining/sunroom while drinking your morning coffee.

Beautiful home on an oversized tree covered lot fronting Hidden Falls Golf Course. This tradtional style home has a welcoming and easy to traverse floor plan with a formal dining or office area positioned towards the front of the home and a large breakfast area off of the kitchen. Granite countertop breakfast bar graces the kitchen open to the breakfast area. Large and open living room. Split floorplan providing privacy to the primary ensuite bedroom and bathroom. Laundry room is positioned near the garage back door. Large sunroom to enjoy the beautifully manicured golf course views. Many updates throughout including carpet, paint, new roof in Summer 2024, new front window. This home has a

Features: Prime Location: Enjoy exclusive resident access to Lake LBJ and Lake Marble Falls, perfect for boating, fishing, and water sports enthusiasts. Scenic Views: Just step outside, and you'll be greeted by a stunning view of the water to your left, a daily reminder of the beauty that surrounds you. Wildlife Haven: The area is teeming with deer and other wildlife, offering a serene, natural environment right at your doorstep. Convenient Access: Close proximity to Marble Falls and Horseshoe Bay means you’re never far from shopping, dining, and entertainment. This home is perfect for those seeking a peaceful, nature-filled lifestyle without sacrificing the conveniences of nearby

Burnet County, TX home for sale

Rare opportunity to own this beautiful home located on 5 acres within Log Country Cove subdivision. Water access available thru management company. This stunning investment opportunity features some of the best places to relax in the Texas Hill Country. A unique 14" log home with 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, and a large loft. This is one of the few homes in Log Country Cove that is multigenerational. The Master is located downstairs making for a perfect place to relax after a day at the pool or lake. The Master bath has a jetted tub. The stone fireplace and large main gathering room will bring the whole family together! Professional pool table is located downstairs. The outdoor amenities a

Situated on a generous three-lot parcel, this property offers an incredible canvas for customization and expansion. Currently 50% complete, the home features a spacious layout with three bedrooms and two bathrooms, designed with modern living in mind. The open-concept floor plan allows for seamless flow between the living, dining, and kitchen areas, providing ample room for entertaining and everyday comfort. 911 Legends Parkway is the epitome of Lake LBJ waterfront luxury! This 3.3-acre estate in the gated golf & waterfront community of The Legends offers 250’ feet of breathtaking open waterfront. It features a stunning blue negative-edge pool with a spa and slide, a spacious covered patio, and an extraordinary man cave with a full bar, pool table, and ice cream station. The multi-generational design includes an open-concept main living area, a gourmet kitchen, a theater room, a primary suite with a spa bath, and multiple guest suites. Nestled in the heart of Burnet Texas, this modern single-family home is located at 220 Cinnamon Loop in the Peppermill Subdivision. This charming home was built in 2022 and its open floor plan offers an inviting atmosphere. This home includes 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, a water softener and automatic sprinkler system in both front and back yards. Vinyl flooring in all common areas with carpet offered in the bedrooms. Granite countertops are featured in the kitchen and both bathrooms. This home offers a spacious backyard including a pergola with fire pit area, perfect for entertaining. Conveniently located close to schools, shopping, and main roads. Don't miss the opportunity to call this

Burnet County, TX home for sale

Make 4214 Mountain Dew your new home in Horseshoe Bay! This 2023 single-level home offers 1,600 sq ft of living space, with three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a designated office, and a spacious 2-car garage. The open-concept great room features high ceilings and abundant natural light. The kitchen boasts custom knotty alder wood cabinets and granite countertops, with engineered hardwood and tile flooring throughout for easy maintenance. The primary suite includes custom tile work and a generous closet. Additional highlights include Marble Falls ISD, proximity to the HSB Resort (membership required), HOA parks, and the airport. The home also offers a separate laundry room and plenty of storage.

The secondary bedrooms are located off the dining area. The private main bedroom, bedroom 1, is located off the kitchen and includes a huge walk-in closet and walk-in shower. Burnet County, TX home for sale

Welcome Home to this stunning better than new construction property! If you've been looking and dreaming of a model home like house, this is your chance. Built by the custom home builder Group 3 Homes in 2022 with no upgrade spared, this home shows like new and is absolutely immaculate. Tucked away on a huge one acre cul-de-sac lot in a gated community the location is perfect. From the moment you walk in the door you will be in awe of all of the beautiful finishes and personal touches. This exquisite home offers extensive high-end upgrades and has a floor plan with tons of flexibility (including a study)- can live like either a 3 bedroom with bonus room or 4 bedroom depending on your needs
